issue.title: [CF 1574] No Timer Text over Item or Spell Cooldowns
issue.body:
For the past few days I have been unable to see Timer Text over Spell or Item Cooldowns. The visual sweep animation occurs, but the timer text does not show (with the Timer Text enabled). These are all on TMW setups that have worked for months (if not years) so far.

 

I have tried to see if any of my other addons are interfering by disabling all but TMW and OmniCC with no luck. Disabling OmniCC and enabling the default Blizzard Timer Text works.

 

OmniCC works with my other addons (or action bars). I have reinstalled both OmniCC and TMW (without clearing data). Also tested on a character that did not have any TMW data setup before with the same result.

 

Am I missing something?


> Posted by CurseForge user Dwel | Imported from CurseForge issue #1574 | Raw

comments.body:
The same thing is happening to me. Happy to know its not just me. I have also reinstalled both addons and have the same problem.


> Posted by CurseForge user Superteddy50

Same, was after the lastest update.


> Posted by CurseForge user lttd

Well I am happy to know it's not an issue with my system.

 

I have the same issue and also did the same troubleshooting as Dwel before checking here.

 


> Posted by CurseForge user Froagh

If you're having this issue, you installed a beta version of OmniCC. Stick to release versions if you want to avoid breaking changes. The change in OmniCC that broke this also broke WeakAuras in the exact same way. 

 

Your Twitch app may be configured to prefer beta or alpha versions - you can set it to Release on a per-addon basis:

 

https://github.com/tullamods/OmniCC/issues/235

 

Leaving this issue open for a while for visibility.

Edited Sep 9, 2018

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Thanks, that did it! I didn't realize the "beta channel" was active within the Twitch client, so even on reinstall it still got the faulty version of OmniCC.


> Posted by CurseForge user Dwel
